article.title: Status and history for [aka_akuapem]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: changed from ISO 639-3: ak, BCP 47: ak to ISO 639-3: twi, BCP 47: tw-akuapem.
replaced all the occurrences of U+0251 ɑ LATIN SMALL LETTER ALPHA by U+0061 a LATIN SMALL LETTER A. Thanks to Denis Moyogo Jacquerye for pointing out this mistake.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
